targets.query:
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "twinficient-aggregates")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "aggregations")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["Company"] == "${Company_1}" and r["CelNr"] == "${CelNr_1}" and r["HzNr"] == "${HzNr_1}" and r["HgNr"] == "${HgNr_1}") or (r["Company"] == "${Company_2}" and r["CelNr"] == "${CelNr_2}" and r["HzNr"] == "${HzNr_2}" and r["HgNr"] == "${HgNr_2}"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "RtPerDay")
  |> group(columns: ["Company", "CelNr", "HzNr", "HgNr"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum, timeSrc: "_start")

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

from(bucket: "twinficient-aggregates")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "aggregations")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["Company"] == "${Company_1}" and r["CelNr"] == "${CelNr_1}" and r["HzNr"] == "${HzNr_1}" and r["HgNr"] == "${HgNr_1}") or (r["Company"] == "${Company_2}" and r["CelNr"] == "${CelNr_2}" and r["HzNr"] == "${HzNr_2}" and r["HgNr"] == "${HgNr_2}"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ErrorCodesPerDay")
  |> group(columns: ["Company", "CelNr", "HzNr", "HgNr"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum, timeSrc: "_start")

from(bucket: "twinficient")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "celestra")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["Company"] == "${Company_1}" and r["CelNr"] == "${CelNr_1}" and r["HzNr"] == "${HzNr_1}" and r["HgNr"] == "${HgNr_1}") or (r["Company"] == "${Company_2}" and r["CelNr"] == "${CelNr_2}" and r["HzNr"] == "${HzNr_2}" and r["HgNr"] == "${HgNr_2}"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "HgIonCurr" or r["_field"] == "HgStat")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["Company","CelNr","HzNr","HgNr"])
  |> duplicate(column: "HgIonCurr", as: "DifHgIonCurr")
  |> duplicate(column: "HgStat", as: "DifHgStat")
  |> difference(columns: ["DifHgIonCurr","DifHgStat"], keepFirst: true)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r.DifHgIonCurr != 0 or (r.DifHgStat != 0 and r.HgStat == 0)) and r.HgIonCurr > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with HgIonCurr: float(v: r.HgIonCurr)/10.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["Company","CelNr","HzNr","HgNr","_time", "HgIonCurr"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
 
schema.tagValues(
    bucket: "twinficient",
    tag: "Company",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "celestra",
    start: 0
)
list.label: Company 1
list.name: Company_1
